citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:05pm on 16-MAR-
2023.
The inspector arrived at the facility and tried calling and texting the known contact numbers with no response. The
courtyard gate at the facility entrance was closed. There was no response by phone or text by the licensee after 30
minutes, so the inspector then left the premises.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:05pm on 16-MAR-
2023. 
The inspector arrived at the facility and tried calling and texting the known contact numbers with no response. The 
courtyard gate at the facility entrance was closed. There was no response by phone or text by the licensee after 30 
minutes, so the inspector then left the premises. 
 
 
 
End Section
